nodes.text: Blaise Zirkonn was a Human Inquisitorius agent who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

A Force-sensitive Human born on Naboo to the ancient House Zirkonn, Blaise Zirkonn was educated at the best schools of her homeworld before enrolling in the Imperial Academy. Intending on joining the Imperial Diplomatic Corps, she was identified by Imperial Intelligence as a Forceful individual and directed toward the Inquisitorius. Serving for a decade as an agent within the Inquisitorius, Zirkonn was attached to the Emperor's Retreat and attended the Emperor's court when he was present on the planet. Running the intelligence network in Theed through agents like Zerala Dinn, Zirkonn was always hunting for Forcefuls to induct into the Inquisitorius.

Despite not serving as an Inquisitor, Zirkonn carried a lightsaber of her own creation and wielded the Force to influence those around her. She also wore a heavy blaster pistol on a utility belt slung over her concealed armor.
